title: ProMedica Flower Hospital - Labor and Deliver

content.name: ProMedica Flower Hospital - Labor and Delivery
content.description:
At ProMedica Flower Hospital, A Division of ProMedica Toledo Hospital, we have our area’s first combined labor, delivery, recovery, and postpartum suites. Our maternity unit is family-centered with 16 private rooms that include a:

  • Sleeper sofa.
  • Refrigerator.
  • Microwave.

We encourage you to take a maternity tour during the seventh or eighth month of your pregnancy so you’ll feel as comfortable as possible when the big day arrives.

We offer a full range of infant care, childbirth, childbirth education, prevention, and diagnostic services. We feature:

  • 24-hour in-house anesthesia coverage.
  • 24-hour in-house obstetrician coverage.
  • 24-hour on-call coverage by the neonatologist at ProMedica Toledo Children’s Hospital.
  • A Lactation Center, with up-to-date information about breastfeeding. Call our WARMLINE at 419-291-4577.

Take a Virtual Tour

PC users: please use Microsoft Edge or Google Chrome to view the virtual tour. Virtual tour will not load in Internet Explorer.

title: ProMedica ForeverFit

content.name: ProMedica ForeverFit
content.description:
ProMedica ForeverFit

Our focus is providing our members with fitness services and a wide range of wellness programs tailored to support healthy aging.

Medically Integrated Fitness Center

As a medically integrated fitness center, ForeverFit has the professional expertise and programming necessary to safely and effectively assist our members to develop, initiate, and maintain an active lifestyle regardless of their current health status. This helps minimize the risk of illness and disease and promotes health and wellness.

How We're Different

  • Our Medical Director provides medical oversight for the facility’s programming in order to maximize the safety of all participants and ensure medically and scientifically sound programs and services.
  • Our professional staff includes fitness team members who have a degree in exercise science and are certified by the National Academy of Sports Medicine.
  • We offer outcome-based fitness programs, such as Script4Fitness, Bridge to Fitness, and Phase 3 Cardiopulmonary Rehab.

Find Us

2865 N. Reynolds Rd.
Toledo, OH 43615

Call (419) 539-0235

Follow us on Facebook

Hours

Monday - Friday: 5:00AM - 8:00PM
Saturday & Sunday: 7:00AM - 2:00PM

Calendars

Group Exercise Calendar

Swim Lane Reservation Schedule

Fitness and Wellness Programs

Group Exercise Classes

We offer classes for all fitness levels:

  • Barre, Cycling, Move & Tone, Boot Camp, Core & More, Group Power and Group Groove.
  • A variety of Yoga classes (Chair Yoga, Yoga Flow, Hath Yoga and Power Yoga).
  • Aqua-Robics (Aqua-Yoga, Gentle Aquatics, Aqua Tabata, Power Aqua).
  • Free Small Group Training Classes (Pilates Reformer and Fascia Release).

ProMedica ForeverFit Fitness App

Enjoy your favorite group exercise classes at home or on the go. The ProMedica ForeverFit app has over 20 different On-Demand Group exercise classes with new classes updated on a monthly basis. Reserve your spot with our quick and easy class booking and swim lane reservations. Log your workouts and food intake and participate in our monthly fitness challenges.

Personal Training

Based on your needs and preferences, we will match you with one of our Exercise Physiologists. Your health goals and medical needs will be integrated into customized, timesaving workout sessions schedule at your convenience. Individual and group training options available.

Pilates Reformer Training

Our professionally trained instructors will guide you through workouts using specialized Pilates Reformer equipment. Pilates promotes core strength, flexibility, strong back and balanced body.

Titleist individualized Golf Fitness Program

Our Golf Fitness program helps you develop a better swing by focusing on the five pillars of the golf swing: flexibility, balance, stabilization, power, muscular strength and endurance.

Wellness Services

We offer a variety of wellness services, including:

  • Massage therapy.
  • Swim lessons.
  • Nutrition counseling, health screenings and cooking demos.
  • Lifelong education opportunities through the Healthy Living Lecture Series on topics such as chronic condition education and caring for aging parents.
​​​​​​​​​​​​

It is a clinical hoop house and is the second in Michigan. The hoop house features raised garden beds at various heights for children and people in wheelchairs, as well as railings and staircases for physical therapy. This will allow patients to learn how to maneuver on different turfs.

Contact Us

Email: promedica.farms@promedica.org

Volunteer at ProMedica Farms

Images


Hoop House


Inside of ProMedica Farms


Outside of ProMedica Farms


ProMedica Farms Overview

The Veggie Mobile

The Veggie Mobile provides a solution to address the availability of local, healthy food throughout Lenawee County, by supporting local agricultural producers and increasing the availability of reasonably priced, nutrient dense, fresh food. By empowering the community to support local producers, the project establishes a source of healthy, farm-to-fork, food retail outlets in food deserts and low-income areas.

In 2014, the program took another step toward reducing food insecurity; a SNAP machine was obtained to extend SNAP recipients' purchasing power and provider further access to fresh fruits and vegetables for low-income residents of Lenawee County. In 2017, the Veggie Mobile began supporting Tecumseh students through the Back Pack Buddies program, which allows 120 students to receive fruit and snacks to supplement meals on weekends.

View the Veggie Mobile Schedule

title: ProMedica Flower Hospital - Emergency Center 5200 Harroun Road, Sylvania, Ohio (OH), 43560

content.name: ProMedica Flower Hospital - Emergency Center
content.description:
Experts in emergency medicine quickly get you the medical attention you need and will transfer you to more advanced care, if necessary. To contact the Emergency Center, call 419-690-7900. Call 9-1-1 immediately if you're experiencing a medical emergency. 

When you or a loved one needs emergency care, you can trust our staff for the level of care you need. The ProMedica Flower Hospital Emergency staff treats approximately 30,000 patients each year.

The Emergency Center features:

  • 25 private beds.
  • Two radiology suites that provide convenient diagnostic imaging services for fast responses.
  • Immediate access to a dedicated 64-slice CT scan.
  • Primary Stroke Center.

For our most urgent cases, ProMedica Air and Mobile Transportation Network is available to transport patients who require the specialized treatment available at ProMedica Toledo Hospital.

Call our Emergency Center at 419-824-1442. If you’re experiencing an emergency, call 911 now.

Learn more about emergency services at ProMedica and download the “Know Where to Go” guide.

title: ProMedica Flower Hospital - Labor and Deliver

content.name: ProMedica Flower Hospital - Labor and Delivery
content.description:
At ProMedica Flower Hospital, A Division of ProMedica Toledo Hospital, we have our area’s first combined labor, delivery, recovery, and postpartum suites. Our maternity unit is family-centered with 16 private rooms that include a:

  • Sleeper sofa.
  • Refrigerator.
  • Microwave.

We encourage you to take a maternity tour during the seventh or eighth month of your pregnancy so you’ll feel as comfortable as possible when the big day arrives.

We offer a full range of infant care, childbirth, childbirth education, prevention, and diagnostic services. We feature:

  • 24-hour in-house anesthesia coverage.
  • 24-hour in-house obstetrician coverage.
  • 24-hour on-call coverage by the neonatologist at ProMedica Toledo Children’s Hospital.
  • A Lactation Center, with up-to-date information about breastfeeding. Call our WARMLINE at 419-291-4577.

Take a Virtual Tour

PC users: please use Microsoft Edge or Google Chrome to view the virtual tour. Virtual tour will not load in Internet Explorer.

title: ProMedica ForeverFit

content.name: ProMedica ForeverFit
content.description:
ProMedica ForeverFit

Our focus is providing our members with fitness services and a wide range of wellness programs tailored to support healthy aging.

Medically Integrated Fitness Center

As a medically integrated fitness center, ForeverFit has the professional expertise and programming necessary to safely and effectively assist our members to develop, initiate, and maintain an active lifestyle regardless of their current health status. This helps minimize the risk of illness and disease and promotes health and wellness.

How We're Different

  • Our Medical Director provides medical oversight for the facility’s programming in order to maximize the safety of all participants and ensure medically and scientifically sound programs and services.
  • Our professional staff includes fitness team members who have a degree in exercise science and are certified by the National Academy of Sports Medicine.
  • We offer outcome-based fitness programs, such as Script4Fitness, Bridge to Fitness, and Phase 3 Cardiopulmonary Rehab.

Find Us

2865 N. Reynolds Rd.
Toledo, OH 43615

Call (419) 539-0235

Follow us on Facebook

Hours

Monday - Friday: 5:00AM - 8:00PM
Saturday & Sunday: 7:00AM - 2:00PM

Calendars

Group Exercise Calendar

Swim Lane Reservation Schedule

Fitness and Wellness Programs

Group Exercise Classes

We offer classes for all fitness levels:

  • Barre, Cycling, Move & Tone, Boot Camp, Core & More, Group Power and Group Groove.
  • A variety of Yoga classes (Chair Yoga, Yoga Flow, Hath Yoga and Power Yoga).
  • Aqua-Robics (Aqua-Yoga, Gentle Aquatics, Aqua Tabata, Power Aqua).
  • Free Small Group Training Classes (Pilates Reformer and Fascia Release).

ProMedica ForeverFit Fitness App

Enjoy your favorite group exercise classes at home or on the go. The ProMedica ForeverFit app has over 20 different On-Demand Group exercise classes with new classes updated on a monthly basis. Reserve your spot with our quick and easy class booking and swim lane reservations. Log your workouts and food intake and participate in our monthly fitness challenges.

Personal Training

Based on your needs and preferences, we will match you with one of our Exercise Physiologists. Your health goals and medical needs will be integrated into customized, timesaving workout sessions schedule at your convenience. Individual and group training options available.

Pilates Reformer Training

Our professionally trained instructors will guide you through workouts using specialized Pilates Reformer equipment. Pilates promotes core strength, flexibility, strong back and balanced body.

Titleist individualized Golf Fitness Program

Our Golf Fitness program helps you develop a better swing by focusing on the five pillars of the golf swing: flexibility, balance, stabilization, power, muscular strength and endurance.

Wellness Services

We offer a variety of wellness services, including:

  • Massage therapy.
  • Swim lessons.
  • Nutrition counseling, health screenings and cooking demos.
  • Lifelong education opportunities through the Healthy Living Lecture Series on topics such as chronic condition education and caring for aging parents.
​​​​​​​​​​​​

title: ProMedica Fostoria Community Hospital

content.name: ProMedica Fostoria Community Hospital
content.description:
Our Mission is to improve your health and well-being. For nearly 90 years, ProMedica Fostoria Community Hospital has served our friends in Fostoria, Ohio, and the surrounding three counties. Fostoria Community Hospital is a full-service, critical-access hospital (with the exception of obstetrics/labor and delivery) with Joint Commission accreditation.

Cancer Care at Fostoria Community Hospital

Dialysis Center at Fostoria Community Hospital

Our staff. Here, you and your loved ones benefit from the exceptional and dedicated care from our more than 250 active and compassionate local clinical staff members. We’re neighbors caring for our neighbors.

Community involvement. As one of the largest employers in Fostoria, we’re also deeply invested in the economic and social health and wellness of our community. Our involvement includes the Fostoria Chamber of Commerce and the Fostoria Economic Development Corporation. We also provide resources and leadership support / board involvement for local organizations like the United Way of Fostoria and the Fostoria Kiwanis and Rotary Clubs.

Download our community benefit report.

  • Minor burns

  • Body and muscle aches
  • Minor eye injuries, infections and irritations

When you or a loved one needs emergency care, you can trust our staff for the level of care you need. The ProMedica Flower Hospital Emergency staff treats approximately 30,000 patients each year.

The Emergency Center features:

  • 25 private beds.
  • Two radiology suites that provide convenient diagnostic imaging services for fast responses.
  • Immediate access to a dedicated 64-slice CT scan.
  • Primary Stroke Center.

For our most urgent cases, ProMedica Air and Mobile Transportation Network is available to transport patients who require the specialized treatment available at ProMedica Toledo Hospital.

Call our Emergency Center at 419-824-1442. If you’re experiencing an emergency, call 911 now.

Learn more about emergency services at ProMedica and download the “Know Where to Go” guide.

title: ProMedica Flower Hospital - Labor and Deliver

content.name: ProMedica Flower Hospital - Labor and Delivery
content.description:
At ProMedica Flower Hospital, A Division of ProMedica Toledo Hospital, we have our area’s first combined labor, delivery, recovery, and postpartum suites. Our maternity unit is family-centered with 16 private rooms that include a:

  • Sleeper sofa.
  • Refrigerator.
  • Microwave.

We encourage you to take a maternity tour during the seventh or eighth month of your pregnancy so you’ll feel as comfortable as possible when the big day arrives.

We offer a full range of infant care, childbirth, childbirth education, prevention, and diagnostic services. We feature:

  • 24-hour in-house anesthesia coverage.
  • 24-hour in-house obstetrician coverage.
  • 24-hour on-call coverage by the neonatologist at ProMedica Toledo Children’s Hospital.
  • A Lactation Center, with up-to-date information about breastfeeding. Call our WARMLINE at 419-291-4577.

title: ProMedica ForeverFit

content.name: ProMedica ForeverFit
content.description:
ProMedica ForeverFit

Our focus is providing our members with fitness services and a wide range of wellness programs tailored to support healthy aging.

Medically Integrated Fitness Center

As a medically integrated fitness center, ForeverFit has the professional expertise and programming necessary to safely and effectively assist our members to develop, initiate, and maintain an active lifestyle regardless of their current health status. This helps minimize the risk of illness and disease and promotes health and wellness.

How We're Different

  • Our Medical Director provides medical oversight for the facility’s programming in order to maximize the safety of all participants and ensure medically and scientifically sound programs and services.
  • Our professional staff includes fitness team members who have a degree in exercise science and are certified by the National Academy of Sports Medicine.
  • We offer outcome-based fitness programs, such as Script4Fitness, Bridge to Fitness, and Phase 3 Cardiopulmonary Rehab.

Find Us

2865 N. Reynolds Rd.
Toledo, OH 43615

Call (419) 539-0235

Follow us on Facebook

Hours

Monday - Friday: 5:00AM - 8:00PM
Saturday & Sunday: 7:00AM - 2:00PM

Calendars

Group Exercise Calendar

Swim Lane Reservation Schedule

Fitness and Wellness Programs

Group Exercise Classes

We offer classes for all fitness levels:

  • Barre, Cycling, Move & Tone, Boot Camp, Core & More, Group Power and Group Groove.
  • A variety of Yoga classes (Chair Yoga, Yoga Flow, Hath Yoga and Power Yoga).
  • Aqua-Robics (Aqua-Yoga, Gentle Aquatics, Aqua Tabata, Power Aqua).
  • Free Small Group Training Classes (Pilates Reformer and Fascia Release).

ProMedica ForeverFit Fitness App

Enjoy your favorite group exercise classes at home or on the go. The ProMedica ForeverFit app has over 20 different On-Demand Group exercise classes with new classes updated on a monthly basis. Reserve your spot with our quick and easy class booking and swim lane reservations. Log your workouts and food intake and participate in our monthly fitness challenges.

Personal Training

Based on your needs and preferences, we will match you with one of our Exercise Physiologists. Your health goals and medical needs will be integrated into customized, timesaving workout sessions schedule at your convenience. Individual and group training options available.

Pilates Reformer Training

Our professionally trained instructors will guide you through workouts using specialized Pilates Reformer equipment. Pilates promotes core strength, flexibility, strong back and balanced body.

Titleist individualized Golf Fitness Program

Our Golf Fitness program helps you develop a better swing by focusing on the five pillars of the golf swing: flexibility, balance, stabilization, power, muscular strength and endurance.

Wellness Services

We offer a variety of wellness services, including:

  • Massage therapy.
  • Swim lessons.
  • Nutrition counseling, health screenings and cooking demos.
  • Lifelong education opportunities through the Healthy Living Lecture Series on topics such as chronic condition education and caring for aging parents.
​​​​​​​​​​​​

title: ProMedica Fostoria Community Hospital

content.name: ProMedica Fostoria Community Hospital
content.description:
Our Mission is to improve your health and well-being. For nearly 90 years, ProMedica Fostoria Community Hospital has served our friends in Fostoria, Ohio, and the surrounding three counties. Fostoria Community Hospital is a full-service, critical-access hospital (with the exception of obstetrics/labor and delivery) with Joint Commission accreditation.

Cancer Care at Fostoria Community Hospital

Dialysis Center at Fostoria Community Hospital

Our staff. Here, you and your loved ones benefit from the exceptional and dedicated care from our more than 250 active and compassionate local clinical staff members. We’re neighbors caring for our neighbors.

Community involvement. As one of the largest employers in Fostoria, we’re also deeply invested in the economic and social health and wellness of our community. Our involvement includes the Fostoria Chamber of Commerce and the Fostoria Economic Development Corporation. We also provide resources and leadership support / board involvement for local organizations like the United Way of Fostoria and the Fostoria Kiwanis and Rotary Clubs.

Download our community benefit report.

title: ProMedica Farms 1201 Shepherd Rd., Tecumseh, Michigan (MI), 49286

content.name: ProMedica Farms
content.description:
About ProMedica Farms

ProMedica Farms is situated on 3 acres on M-52 in Lenawee County. The farm includes several barns, walking paths, and a hoop house for indoor growing. This is part of ProMedica’s effort to encourage healthy eating and preventative care.

The hoop house is made of metal framing and a heavy-duty, translucent plastic film that provides solar heating during the day and protection from the elements. It is a clinical hoop house and is the second in Michigan. The hoop house features raised garden beds at various heights for children and people in wheelchairs, as well as railings and staircases for physical therapy. This will allow patients to learn how to maneuver on different turfs.

Contact Us

Email: promedica.farms@promedica.org

Volunteer at ProMedica Farms

Images


Hoop House


Inside of ProMedica Farms


Outside of ProMedica Farms


ProMedica Farms Overview

The Veggie Mobile

The Veggie Mobile provides a solution to address the availability of local, healthy food throughout Lenawee County, by supporting local agricultural producers and increasing the availability of reasonably priced, nutrient dense, fresh food. By empowering the community to support local producers, the project establishes a source of healthy, farm-to-fork, food retail outlets in food deserts and low-income areas.

In 2014, the program took another step toward reducing food insecurity; a SNAP machine was obtained to extend SNAP recipients' purchasing power and provider further access to fresh fruits and vegetables for low-income residents of Lenawee County. In 2017, the Veggie Mobile began supporting Tecumseh students through the Back Pack Buddies program, which allows 120 students to receive fruit and snacks to supplement meals on weekends.

View the Veggie Mobile Schedule

title: ProMedica ForeverFit

content.name: ProMedica ForeverFit
content.description:
ProMedica ForeverFit

Our focus is providing our members with fitness services and a wide range of wellness programs tailored to support healthy aging.

Medically Integrated Fitness Center

As a medically integrated fitness center, ForeverFit has the professional expertise and programming necessary to safely and effectively assist our members to develop, initiate, and maintain an active lifestyle regardless of their current health status. This helps minimize the risk of illness and disease and promotes health and wellness.

How We're Different

  • Our Medical Director provides medical oversight for the facility’s programming in order to maximize the safety of all participants and ensure medically and scientifically sound programs and services.
  • Our professional staff includes fitness team members who have a degree in exercise science and are certified by the National Academy of Sports Medicine.
  • We offer outcome-based fitness programs, such as Script4Fitness, Bridge to Fitness, and Phase 3 Cardiopulmonary Rehab.

Find Us

2865 N. Reynolds Rd.
Toledo, OH 43615

Call (419) 539-0235

Follow us on Facebook

Hours

Monday - Friday: 5:00AM - 8:00PM
Saturday & Sunday: 7:00AM - 2:00PM

Calendars

Group Exercise Calendar

Swim Lane Reservation Schedule

Fitness and Wellness Programs

Group Exercise Classes

We offer classes for all fitness levels:

  • Barre, Cycling, Move & Tone, Boot Camp, Core & More, Group Power and Group Groove.
  • A variety of Yoga classes (Chair Yoga, Yoga Flow, Hath Yoga and Power Yoga).
  • Aqua-Robics (Aqua-Yoga, Gentle Aquatics, Aqua Tabata, Power Aqua).
  • Free Small Group Training Classes (Pilates Reformer and Fascia Release).

ProMedica ForeverFit Fitness App

Enjoy your favorite group exercise classes at home or on the go. The ProMedica ForeverFit app has over 20 different On-Demand Group exercise classes with new classes updated on a monthly basis. Reserve your spot with our quick and easy class booking and swim lane reservations. Log your workouts and food intake and participate in our monthly fitness challenges.

Personal Training

Based on your needs and preferences, we will match you with one of our Exercise Physiologists. Your health goals and medical needs will be integrated into customized, timesaving workout sessions schedule at your convenience. Individual and group training options available.

Pilates Reformer Training

Our professionally trained instructors will guide you through workouts using specialized Pilates Reformer equipment. Pilates promotes core strength, flexibility, strong back and balanced body.

Titleist individualized Golf Fitness Program

Our Golf Fitness program helps you develop a better swing by focusing on the five pillars of the golf swing: flexibility, balance, stabilization, power, muscular strength and endurance.

Wellness Services

We offer a variety of wellness services, including:

  • Massage therapy.
  • Swim lessons.
  • Nutrition counseling, health screenings and cooking demos.
  • Lifelong education opportunities through the Healthy Living Lecture Series on topics such as chronic condition education and caring for aging parents.
​​​​​​​​​​​​

title: ProMedica Fostoria Community Hospital

content.name: ProMedica Fostoria Community Hospital
content.description:
Our Mission is to improve your health and well-being. For nearly 90 years, ProMedica Fostoria Community Hospital has served our friends in Fostoria, Ohio, and the surrounding three counties. Fostoria Community Hospital is a full-service, critical-access hospital (with the exception of obstetrics/labor and delivery) with Joint Commission accreditation.

Cancer Care at Fostoria Community Hospital

Dialysis Center at Fostoria Community Hospital

Our staff. Here, you and your loved ones benefit from the exceptional and dedicated care from our more than 250 active and compassionate local clinical staff members. We’re neighbors caring for our neighbors.

Community involvement. As one of the largest employers in Fostoria, we’re also deeply invested in the economic and social health and wellness of our community. Our involvement includes the Fostoria Chamber of Commerce and the Fostoria Economic Development Corporation. We also provide resources and leadership support / board involvement for local organizations like the United Way of Fostoria and the Fostoria Kiwanis and Rotary Clubs.

Download our community benefit report.

title: ProMedica Monroe Regional Hospital - Emergency Center 718 N. Macomb St., Monroe, Michigan (MI), 48162

content.imgAlt: ProMedica Monroe Regional Hospital - Emergency Center
content.name: ProMedica Monroe Regional Hospital - Emergency Center
content.description:
Our Level III Trauma Center handles everything from broken bones to heart attacks and strokes. We feature advanced technology to accurately diagnose and treat your conditions.

    The Emergency Center features:
  • 30 private beds
  • Three radiology suites that provide convenient diagnostic imaging services for quick responses including x-ray, CT and MRI
    Along with typical emergencies, we are equipped to treat more critical patients by:
  • Offering PCI for interventional cardiology
  • Providing immediate diagnosis and treatment for stroke patients (Certified Primary Stroke Center)
  • Employing ICU physicians who are trained in critical care

For our most urgent cases, ProMedica Transportation Network (Air and Mobile) is available to transport patients who require the specialized treatment available at ProMedica Toledo Hospital.

Learn more about emergency services at ProMedica

title: ProMedica Monroe Regional Hospital - Labor and Delivery

content.name: ProMedica Monroe Regional Hospital - Labor and Delivery
content.description:
Maternity Services

Today's parents want their children born into the warm embrace of family. To accommodate that desire, ProMedica Monroe Regional Hospital has completely renovated its obstetrical unit. 
The hospital offers expectant parents six spacious, luxuriously appointed labor-delivery-recovery rooms, commonly known as birthing suites. Filled with homelike furnishings and soft lighting, the birthing suites provide an atmosphere that's warm and comfortable. And they are large enough to allow family members to share in the joy and wonder of birth. 
While the birthing suites resemble a home bedroom, all the modern equipment needed to ensure the health of the mother and child is in place. 

In addition to large, more comfortable accommodations, the birthing suites allow the mother to remain in one place during all phases of the birth. Because you don't have to move from room to room, the family can spend the first precious hours of life with its newest member in a tranquil comfortable setting.

 ProMedica Monroe Regional Hospital is also a proud member of the Monroe County Great Start Collaborative, which promotes and supports early childhood issues.

Check out our online baby gallery!

ProMedica Monroe Regional Hospital - Orthopaedics 718 N. Macomb St., Monroe, Michigan (MI), 48162

ProMedica Monroe Regional Hospital - Radiology - CT (Computed Tomography), Digital Mammography (Diagnostic), MRI (Magnetic Resonance Imaging), Ultrasound, X-ray - 718 North Macomb St., Monroe, Michigan (MI), 48162

content.name: ProMedica Monroe Regional Hospital - Radiology
content.description:
Radiology

When you need to have a test done, it's nice to know there is a hospital that offers convenient appointments to fit your schedule. To request an appointment for a test or procedure, either call Central Schedule at (734) 240-4188 or complete our online appointment request. 

Our Diagnostic Imaging Services consist of:

Computed Tomography (CT)

  • Two 64-Slice CT scanners with low dose radiation
  • Siemens SOMATOM Definiton AS
  • Siemens SOMATOM Perspective
  • Larger opening for more comfort
  • Sliding gantry available for diverse applications such as trauma and interventional procedures like CT-guided angiography
  • Able to accept patients up to 600 pounds
  • Ability to offer same-day, next-day appointments
  • All CT technologists are registered

Diagnostic Imaging

  • No appointment needed

Fluoroscopy Imaging

  • Examination includes UGI, Small Bowel, Esophagus, Barium Enema, and Modified Barium Swallow. 

Interventional Radiology

A minimally invasive treatment for vascular and non-vascular disease, using small catheters and catheter-based instruments guided by radiological imaging techniques such as x-rays, fluoroscopy, ultrasound, and CT.

Exams include abscess drainage, needle biopsies, thoracentesis, paracentesis, and chest tube placement, to name a gew. Eight Specialty Registered Nurses and Registered Technologists assist the Radiologist with these procedures.

Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI)

  • 1.5-Tesla MAGNETOM Aera with exclusive Siemens technologies
  • TIM 4G (fourth generation Total Imaging Matrix)
  • DOT (Day Optimizing Throughput)
  • TIM and DOT offer a faster, more comfortable experience for patients
  • Superb image quality offering wide range of applications such as orthopedic and cancer
  • Large bore with an ulta-short opening (70 cm wide by 145 cm long) alleviates most concerns of claustrophobia
  • Able to accept patients up to 550 pounds 

Nuclear Medicine

  • Two, dual head gamma cameras to maximize efficiency and resolution.
  • Correlating scheduling with other imaging departments for continuity of care such as Cardiac stress tests, CT and Ultrasound.
  • Ability to examine patients who have sesitives to contrast media or magnets. Nuclear Medicine uses radioisotopes without contraindiction. 

Ultrasound

  • 3 Philips IU22 machines provide quality examinations to specific areas in the body with the ability of 3D and 4D images.
  • Assists with biopsies and specialized interventional procedures.
  • Ultrasound guided breast core biopsy using the Mammotome Biopsy System, a minimally invasive state-of-the-art technology which is performed in an outpatient setting. 
  • Compliments mammography in Women's Health with breast ultrasound as well as cyst aspirations and needle localizations. 

PET/CT

  • GE Discovery ST is designed to help physicians diagnose and localize cancer faster than ever before.
  • Potention reduction of invasive procedures such as biopsies and unnecessary surgeries.
  • Accurate location of cancer lesions, identification of benign versus malignant lesions, and differentiation from scar tissue. 
  • The ability to monitor the effectiveness of treatment and adjust the plan during, rather than at the end of, treatment. 

Located throughout Monroe County for Your Convenience

Licensed by the College of American Pathologists and the American Association of Blood Banks, ProMedica Monroe Regional Hospital offers full service testing for both inpatients and outpatients seven days a week, 24-hours a day. Outpatient blood draw services are available at the main campus and at various locations throughout Monroe County.

title: ProMedica Pain Management - Fostoria

content.name: ProMedica Pain Management - Fostoria

address.addressOne:
ProMedica Fostoria Community Hospita
501 Van Buren St.

content.description:
By managing your pain, we'll help you
return to your everyday life - and live again.

We provide treatments that reflect the most recent advances in the management of pain at ProMedica Fostoria Community Hospital. We take a multidisciplinary approach toward pain management that involves in-office procedures, physical and aquatic therapy and sometimes medication.

We diagnosis and treat:

  • Neck pain, including work-related injury and "pinched" nerves
  • Back pain, including work-related injury and sciatica
  • Persistent pain after back or neck surgery
  • Headaches
  • Pain/headaches after whiplash
  • Arthritis pain of neck or lower back
  • Complex Regional Pain Syndrome (Reflex Sympathetic Dystrophy or RSD)
  • Nerve damage pain
  • Chronic pelvic pain - Interstitial Cystitis
  • Shingles pain (Postherpetic Neuralgia)
  • Muscle pain

We offer these services:

  • Discography/Spinal Diagnostic Procedures (Cervical, Thoracic, Lumbar)
  • Epidural Steroid Injection
  • Facet Joint Injection
  • Intradiscal Electrothermal Therapy (IDET)
  • Radiofrequency Treatment
  • Intraspinal Drug Therapy

title: ProMedica Monroe Regional Hospital - Emergency Center 718 N. Macomb St., Monroe, Michigan (MI), 48162

content.imgAlt: ProMedica Monroe Regional Hospital - Emergency Center
content.name: ProMedica Monroe Regional Hospital - Emergency Center
content.description:
Our Level III Trauma Center handles everything from broken bones to heart attacks and strokes. We feature advanced technology to accurately diagnose and treat your conditions.

    The Emergency Center features:
  • 30 private beds
  • Three radiology suites that provide convenient diagnostic imaging services for quick responses including x-ray, CT and MRI
    Along with typical emergencies, we are equipped to treat more critical patients by:
  • Offering PCI for interventional cardiology
  • Providing immediate diagnosis and treatment for stroke patients (Certified Primary Stroke Center)
  • Employing ICU physicians who are trained in critical care

For our most urgent cases, ProMedica Transportation Network (Air and Mobile) is available to transport patients who require the specialized treatment available at ProMedica Toledo Hospital.

Learn more about emergency services at ProMedica

title: ProMedica Monroe Regional Hospital - Labor and Delivery

content.name: ProMedica Monroe Regional Hospital - Labor and Delivery
content.description:
Maternity Services

Today's parents want their children born into the warm embrace of family. To accommodate that desire, ProMedica Monroe Regional Hospital has completely renovated its obstetrical unit. 
The hospital offers expectant parents six spacious, luxuriously appointed labor-delivery-recovery rooms, commonly known as birthing suites. Filled with homelike furnishings and soft lighting, the birthing suites provide an atmosphere that's warm and comfortable. And they are large enough to allow family members to share in the joy and wonder of birth. 
While the birthing suites resemble a home bedroom, all the modern equipment needed to ensure the health of the mother and child is in place. 

In addition to large, more comfortable accommodations, the birthing suites allow the mother to remain in one place during all phases of the birth. Because you don't have to move from room to room, the family can spend the first precious hours of life with its newest member in a tranquil comfortable setting.

 ProMedica Monroe Regional Hospital is also a proud member of the Monroe County Great Start Collaborative, which promotes and supports early childhood issues.

Check out our online baby gallery!

ProMedica Monroe Regional Hospital - Radiology - CT (Computed Tomography), Digital Mammography (Diagnostic), MRI (Magnetic Resonance Imaging), Ultrasound, X-ray - 718 North Macomb St., Monroe, Michigan (MI), 48162

content.name: ProMedica Monroe Regional Hospital - Radiology
content.description:
Radiology

When you need to have a test done, it's nice to know there is a hospital that offers convenient appointments to fit your schedule. To request an appointment for a test or procedure, either call Central Schedule at (734) 240-4188 or complete our online appointment request. 

Our Diagnostic Imaging Services consist of:

Computed Tomography (CT)

  • Two 64-Slice CT scanners with low dose radiation
  • Siemens SOMATOM Definiton AS
  • Siemens SOMATOM Perspective
  • Larger opening for more comfort
  • Sliding gantry available for diverse applications such as trauma and interventional procedures like CT-guided angiography
  • Able to accept patients up to 600 pounds
  • Ability to offer same-day, next-day appointments
  • All CT technologists are registered

Diagnostic Imaging

  • No appointment needed

Fluoroscopy Imaging

  • Examination includes UGI, Small Bowel, Esophagus, Barium Enema, and Modified Barium Swallow. 

Interventional Radiology

A minimally invasive treatment for vascular and non-vascular disease, using small catheters and catheter-based instruments guided by radiological imaging techniques such as x-rays, fluoroscopy, ultrasound, and CT.

Exams include abscess drainage, needle biopsies, thoracentesis, paracentesis, and chest tube placement, to name a gew. Eight Specialty Registered Nurses and Registered Technologists assist the Radiologist with these procedures.

Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI)

  • 1.5-Tesla MAGNETOM Aera with exclusive Siemens technologies
  • TIM 4G (fourth generation Total Imaging Matrix)
  • DOT (Day Optimizing Throughput)
  • TIM and DOT offer a faster, more comfortable experience for patients
  • Superb image quality offering wide range of applications such as orthopedic and cancer
  • Large bore with an ulta-short opening (70 cm wide by 145 cm long) alleviates most concerns of claustrophobia
  • Able to accept patients up to 550 pounds 

Nuclear Medicine

  • Two, dual head gamma cameras to maximize efficiency and resolution.
  • Correlating scheduling with other imaging departments for continuity of care such as Cardiac stress tests, CT and Ultrasound.
  • Ability to examine patients who have sesitives to contrast media or magnets. Nuclear Medicine uses radioisotopes without contraindiction. 

Ultrasound

  • 3 Philips IU22 machines provide quality examinations to specific areas in the body with the ability of 3D and 4D images.
  • Assists with biopsies and specialized interventional procedures.
  • Ultrasound guided breast core biopsy using the Mammotome Biopsy System, a minimally invasive state-of-the-art technology which is performed in an outpatient setting. 
  • Compliments mammography in Women's Health with breast ultrasound as well as cyst aspirations and needle localizations. 

PET/CT

  • GE Discovery ST is designed to help physicians diagnose and localize cancer faster than ever before.
  • Potention reduction of invasive procedures such as biopsies and unnecessary surgeries.
  • Accurate location of cancer lesions, identification of benign versus malignant lesions, and differentiation from scar tissue. 
  • The ability to monitor the effectiveness of treatment and adjust the plan during, rather than at the end of, treatment. 

Located throughout Monroe County for Your Convenience

Licensed by the College of American Pathologists and the American Association of Blood Banks, ProMedica Monroe Regional Hospital offers full service testing for both inpatients and outpatients seven days a week, 24-hours a day. Outpatient blood draw services are available at the main campus and at various locations throughout Monroe County.

We provide treatments that reflect the most recent advances in the management of pain at ProMedica Memorial Hospital. We take a multidisciplinary approach toward pain management that involves in-office procedures, physical and aquatic therapy and sometimes medication.

We diagnosis and treat:

  • Neck pain, including work-related injury and "pinched" nerves
  • Back pain, including work-related injury and sciatica
  • Persistent pain after back or neck surgery
  • Headaches
  • Pain/headaches after whiplash
  • Arthritis pain of neck or lower back
  • Complex Regional Pain Syndrome (Reflex Sympathetic Dystrophy or RSD)
  • Nerve damage pain
  • Chronic pelvic pain - Interstitial Cystitis
  • Shingles pain (Postherpetic Neuralgia)
  • Muscle pain

We offer these services:

  • Discography/Spinal Diagnostic Procedures (Cervical, Thoracic, Lumbar)
  • Epidural Steroid Injection
  • Facet Joint Injection
  • Intradiscal Electrothermal Therapy (IDET)
  • Radiofrequency Treatment
  • Intraspinal Drug Therapy
  • Spinal Cord Stimulation (SCS)
  • Myoneural Injection (with or w/o Botox)
  • Nucleoplasty Procedures
  • Selective Nerve Root Block (Transforaminal Epidural Steroid Injection)
  • Superior Hypogastric Plexus and Splanchnic Nerve Block ("Celiac Plexus" Block)
  • Sympathetic Blocks (Stellate Ganglion Block, Lumbar Sympathetic Block)

Although a physician referral can be helpful, it is not required for an appointment at the ProMedica Memorial Hospital Pain Management Center.

If you have questions, or would like to schedule, contact ProMedica Memorial Hospital Pain Management at 419-334-6639.

ProMedica Physicians Gynecology | Oncology - Sylvania - Clinical Research Trials, Dysplasia Evaluation and Management, Medical Oncology, Post-treatment Surveillance, Registered Dietitian Support, Surgical Oncology - 5308 Harroun Rd., Sylvania, Ohio (OH), 43560

content.name: ProMedica Physicians Gynecology | Oncology - Sylvania
content.description:
ProMedica Physicians Gynecology | Oncology – Sylvania is the largest Gynecology Oncology practice in the area. All of our providers are trained in dysplasia and colposcopy from the American Society for Colposcopy and Cervical Pathology(ASCCP). Our ProMedica Cancer Institute Women’s Sexual Health experts are specially trained in understanding the unique physical and emotional effects that cancer treatment can have on a woman’s sexuality. Our providers also specialize in:

  • Patient education on women’s health conditions, lifespan changes and overall wellness.
  • Medical management for a variety of sexual health conditions, including those related to the side effects of cancer treatment.
  • Post-operative care for gynecologic oncology patients.
  • Registered dietitian support.
  • Post-treatment surveillance.

Services at this Location

Endovenous laser ablation

Microphlebectomy

Radio Frequency Closure®

Sclerotherapy

ProMedica Physicians Palliative Medicine - Palliative Medicine - 2142 N. Cove Blvd., Toledo, Ohio (OH), 43606

content.name: ProMedica Physicians Palliative Medicine
content.description:
Palliative care is specialized care for patients living with serious illnesses. It is patient-centered and focused on providing relief from the physical and emotional symptoms often associated with disease progression.

Palliative care can be delivered in conjunction with curative care and treatment plans are created to match the goals of care expressed by the patient and family, regardless of the stage of disease.

Palliative care is based on the patient’s needs, not the patient’s prognosis. In this way, together, we can develop a personalized plan of care focused on your individual goals. Symptoms from a serious/end stage illness that may benefit from palliative care include:

  • Pain
  • Shortness of breath
  • Constipation
  • Diarrhea
  • Nausea
  • Loss of appetite
  • Fatigue
  • Difficulty sleeping
  • Anxiety and/or Depression
  • Increased confusion

Palliative Medicine may also assist with:

  • Education about and completion of Advanced Directives
  • Coordination across various care settings (transitions of care)
  • Disease specific education
  • Access to local community resources

ProMedica Pulmonary / COPD Education Clinic - Toledo 2142 N. Cove Blvd., Toledo, Ohio (OH), 43606

content.name: ProMedica Pulmonary / COPD Education Clinic - Toledo

address.addressOne:
2142 N. Cove Blvd.
Jobst Tower Entrance

content.description:
ProMedica Pulmonary Clinic is a multi-disciplinary team of physicians, respiratory therapists, nurses, pharmacists, discharge planners and social worker working together to treat your pulmonary disease. Our experts will work to empower you and your family to help you successfully manage your disease.

At our clinics we:

  • Educate patients about their medications and how they work.
  • Show patients how to use their inhaler. Teach proper breathing techniques.
  • Partner with patient’s primary care physician or pulmonologist to carefully adjust their medications – when needed.
  • Make recommendations to improve patient’s current treatment plan, if needed, based on the most recent research and guidelines for pulmonary disease management.

title: ProMedica Pulmonary Rehab - Defiance 1200 Ralston Ave., Defiance, Ohio (OH), 43512

content.name: ProMedica Pulmonary Rehab - Defiance
content.description:
Pulmonary rehab is an individualized outpatient program for patients with chronic respiratory (lung) diseases. Our program helps patients achieve and maintain their maximum level of independence and improves their quality of life.

Our team of registered respiratory therapists, exercise physiologists, registered nurses and dietitians work to provide patients with exercise training, education about their disease and help with breathing techniques.

    Patients experience benefits, including:
  • Improved quality of life.
  • Increased physical strength and endurance.
  • Strengthened breathing muscles, which reduce shortness of breath.
  • New prevention techniques to avoid infections and hospitalizations.
  • Education and support to achieve a smoke-free lifestyle.

A physician referral is required to participate in the program.

Our experts will work to empower you and your family to help you successfully manage your disease.

At our clinics we:

  • Educate patients about their medications and how they work.
  • Show patients how to use their inhaler. Teach proper breathing techniques.
  • Partner with patient’s primary care physician or pulmonologist to carefully adjust their medications – when needed.
  • Make recommendations to improve patient’s current treatment plan, if needed, based on the most recent research and guidelines for pulmonary disease management.

title: ProMedica Pulmonary Rehab - Defiance 1200 Ralston Ave., Defiance, Ohio (OH), 43512

content.name: ProMedica Pulmonary Rehab - Defiance
content.description:
Pulmonary rehab is an individualized outpatient program for patients with chronic respiratory (lung) diseases. Our program helps patients achieve and maintain their maximum level of independence and improves their quality of life.

Our team of registered respiratory therapists, exercise physiologists, registered nurses and dietitians work to provide patients with exercise training, education about their disease and help with breathing techniques.

    Patients experience benefits, including:
  • Improved quality of life.
  • Increased physical strength and endurance.
  • Strengthened breathing muscles, which reduce shortness of breath.
  • New prevention techniques to avoid infections and hospitalizations.
  • Education and support to achieve a smoke-free lifestyle.

A physician referral is required to participate in the program.

title: ProMedica Pulmonary Rehab - Defiance 1200 Ralston Ave., Defiance, Ohio (OH), 43512

content.name: ProMedica Pulmonary Rehab - Defiance
content.description:
Pulmonary rehab is an individualized outpatient program for patients with chronic respiratory (lung) diseases. Our program helps patients achieve and maintain their maximum level of independence and improves their quality of life.

Our team of registered respiratory therapists, exercise physiologists, registered nurses and dietitians work to provide patients with exercise training, education about their disease and help with breathing techniques.

    Patients experience benefits, including:
  • Improved quality of life.
  • Increased physical strength and endurance.
  • Strengthened breathing muscles, which reduce shortness of breath.
  • New prevention techniques to avoid infections and hospitalizations.
  • Education and support to achieve a smoke-free lifestyle.

A physician referral is required to participate in the program.

ProMedica Pulmonary / COPD Education Clinic - Toledo 2142 N. Cove Blvd., Toledo, Ohio (OH), 43606

content.name: ProMedica Pulmonary / COPD Education Clinic - Toledo

address.addressOne:
2142 N. Cove Blvd.
Jobst Tower Entrance

content.description:
ProMedica Pulmonary Clinic is a multi-disciplinary team of physicians, respiratory therapists, nurses, pharmacists, discharge planners and social worker working together to treat your pulmonary disease. Our experts will work to empower you and your family to help you successfully manage your disease.

At our clinics we:

  • Educate patients about their medications and how they work.
  • Show patients how to use their inhaler. Teach proper breathing techniques.
  • Partner with patient’s primary care physician or pulmonologist to carefully adjust their medications – when needed.
  • Make recommendations to improve patient’s current treatment plan, if needed, based on the most recent research and guidelines for pulmonary disease management.

title: ProMedica Pulmonary Rehab - Defiance 1200 Ralston Ave., Defiance, Ohio (OH), 43512

content.name: ProMedica Pulmonary Rehab - Defiance
content.description:
Pulmonary rehab is an individualized outpatient program for patients with chronic respiratory (lung) diseases. Our program helps patients achieve and maintain their maximum level of independence and improves their quality of life.

Our team of registered respiratory therapists, exercise physiologists, registered nurses and dietitians work to provide patients with exercise training, education about their disease and help with breathing techniques.

    Patients experience benefits, including:
  • Improved quality of life.
  • Increased physical strength and endurance.
  • Strengthened breathing muscles, which reduce shortness of breath.
  • New prevention techniques to avoid infections and hospitalizations.
  • Education and support to achieve a smoke-free lifestyle.

A physician referral is required to participate in the program.

title: ProMedica Urgent Care for Kids - Perrysburg

content.name: ProMedica Urgent Care for Kids
content.description:
Located N. Dixie Highway in Perrysburg across from Levis Commons, ProMedica Urgent Care for Kids is open from 8 a.m. - 8 p.m. everyday, and committed to treating pediatric patients. Walk-ins are welcome. No appointment is necessary.

Our pediatric urgent care is the area's only urgent care committed to treating children ages 17 and younger.

When your child is sick, you want the best care possible from a place that understands kids. ProMedica Urgent Care for Kids is the only pediatric urgent care in the region dedicated to treating children.

Our pediatric urgent care specialists are here to see your child for common conditions such as:

  • Cold
  • Flu
  • Fever that spikes
  • Minor burns
  • Sprains
  • Sports physicals
  • Ear infections
  • Seasonal allergies
  • Much more

title: ProMedica Wildwood Orthopaedic and Spine Hospital

content.imgAlt: ProMedica Wildwood Orthopaedic and Spine Hospital
content.name: ProMedica Wildwood Orthopaedic and Spine Hospital
content.description:
ProMedica Wildwood Orthopaedic and Spine Hospital is the region’s first and only dedicated orthopaedic specialty hospital. Our experts are devoted to the diagnosis and treatment of bone, muscle, joint, and nerve conditions and injuries.

A division of ProMedica Toledo Hospital, our cutting-edge facility offers sports medicine, bone and joint care, physical therapy and rehabilitation services, plus casting, radiology, and lab tests.

We’re also home to ProMedica ForeverFit, a health club dedicated to healthy aging. Get personal fitness training, group fitness, and social opportunities centered around your commitment to wellness.

We are a specialty hospital with:

  • Forty-two beds, specifically designed for your orthopaedic and spine needs.
  • A patient-centric environment designed with orthopaedic safety in mind, right down to the selection of flooring material.
  • A natural flow from entrance to exit, architected with lean processes.
  • Six operating rooms, featuring the most advanced surgical equipment available.
  • Experienced surgeons, working on the front lines of orthopaedic surgery methods and healing techniques.
  • A surgical nursing staff specially trained in orthopaedic nursing.
  • Immediate access to blood if necessary during orthopaedic surgery.
  • State-of-the-art pain technology, to manage your pain after surgery (particularly joint replacements), reduces narcotics use and speeds up recovery.
  • Physical therapists who specialize in orthopaedic care.
  • Direct access to experienced specialists in sports medicine, arthritis and osteoporosis care, physical therapy and rehabilitation, and more.

Take a virtual tour of our facility.
